original_title: In Too Deep - The True Cost of Deep Sea Mining
overview: As we unravel the mysteries of the deep ocean, we have also discovered the world's largest ecosystem is full of precious minerals. Now, the race to mine the deep sea is posing a serious threat to the last near pristine habitats on the planet. The clock is ticking to stop the largest industrial activity the ocean has ever faced in its tracks.
title: In Too Deep - The True Cost of Deep Sea Mining
